metadata.title: CVE-2018-20723 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in color_templates.php inCacti before 1.2.0 due to lack of escaping of unintended characters in theName field for a Color.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20723` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1').
